title: Listening to Kenny G
description:
If Tig and Cheryl had "Shakers, please hold" music (and they probably should), it would have to be Kenny G! Today's doc is all about the remarkably polarizing Smooth Jazz saxophonist, and if all goes well, this episode of True Story will be stuck in your head for days! *this episode spills beans* Get merch at podswag.com/truestory (tigandcheryltruestory@gmail.com)

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
